lines.text:
[saying grace]
Bless our food. Bless our bikes and let's hope our old ladies are in the mood.
I want to be there for the big event!
Wanna know why they call me squirt?

[Gyspy flies off his bike]
Holy shit, he exploded hisself!

[after Wallace's girlfriend leaves]
She's like a nun. You know why they're called nuns? They ain't got none. They don't want none and they ain't ever gonna get none.
So what do you guys do? All get drunk and get tattoos?
Do any of them have any special meaning.

[shows tattoo]
Yeah, like this one is where I'm from.
Yeah, I know the guy screwed up it's supposed to say South Cadota...Cadota?
We got all the basic food groups. We got beer, chips, dip, and beer.
